question: Which one of the following industries is expanding most in the cooperative sector in recent years?
explanation: In India the white sugar industry is of considerable economic importance. Both area and production of sugarcane fluctuate considerably from year to year. The production of sugarcane during the last three decades more than doubled. The sugar produced are supplied by mills in the cooperative sector is the result that it has become one of the most expanding industry in the cooperative sector in recent years.
